Title: Form Fitting Evening Gown with beading

Category: evening

Featured-image: 

----

Description: This form fitting gown is lace with a sheer overlay. It has a sweetheart neckline and midrise open back. The beading creates a swirling bodice with a design around the waist and extends down the entire length of the skirt into the train. Gorgeously designed for any special event.
